head.title: GameMaker | Make 2D Games With The Free Engine

meta.name: description
meta.content: Make a game with GameMaker, the best free video game engine. Perfect for beginners and professionals. Learn to build your own 2D indie games with our simple tutorials.

div.script: {"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"WebPage","about":"Make a game with GameMaker, the best free video game engine. Perfect for beginners and professionals. Learn to build your own 2D indie games with our simple tutorials.","creator":{"@type":"Organization","foundingDate":"2004","legalName":"YoYo Games Ltd","name":"YoYo Games","sameAs":["https://twitter.com/GameMakerEngine","https://www.facebook.com/GameMakerEngine","https://www.youtube.com/user/yoyogamesltd","https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/YoYo_Games"],"url":"https://gamemaker.io/"},"headline":"The Ultimate 2D Game Engine","name":"GameMaker | Make 2D Games With The Free Engine"}

div.p: GameMaker makes game development easy, regardless of your background or skill level. All you need is an idea!

div.p: "I’m impressed with how well GameMaker scales when you start out - from knowing nothing to getting familiar with it. [...] I still like GameMaker today, as a full time developer, just because it has all the tools I need to make the games."

div.class: m-6 size-full overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-[var(--card-fade-color)] shadow-md md:mx-16

div.p: "It's easy to pick up and start learning. With GameMaker, making games is not only simple, but also fun."

div.class: m-6 size-full overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-[var(--card-fade-color)] shadow-md md:mx-16
relative flex size-full min-h-[600px] flex-col px-5 pb-16 pt-5 lg:max-h-[500px] lg:min-h-[500px] lg:flex-row md:min-h-[800px] md:px-14 md:pt-16

div.p: “GameMaker's systems were easy enough to approach as a novice and are now so second-nature to me that I'm comfortable tackling larger-scale problems that I wouldn't have dreamt of four years ago.”

div.class: m-6 size-full overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-[var(--card-fade-color)] shadow-md md:mx-16
relative flex size-full min-h-[600px] flex-col px-5 pb-16 pt-5 lg:max-h-[500px] lg:min-h-[500px] lg:flex-row md:min-h-[800px] md:px-14 md:pt-16

relative z-10 flex max-w-[600px] flex-col justify-between [filter:drop-shadow(0_20px_20px_var(--card-fade-color-passthrough))] before:absolute before:-inset-40 before:-z-10 before:bg-gradient-to-b before:from-[var(--card-fade-color)] before:to-[var(--card-fade-color-passthrough)] before:[mask-composite:intersect!important] before:[mask:linear-gradient(to_top,transparent,black_33%),linear-gradient(to_left,transparent,black_33%),radial-gradient(circle_at_0,black,transparent_200%)] lg:before:bg-gradient-to-r

div.p: “Using GameMaker's in-built tools let me understand the role they play in game development and gave me the foundations I needed to go on to recreate any of them for myself in larger contexts. It was the perfect stepping stone for me to go from knowing nothing to feeling like I am an experienced games programmer.”

div.class: m-6 size-full overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-[var(--card-fade-color)] shadow-md md:mx-16

div.p: “GameMaker basically taught me how to make games.”

div.class: m-6 size-full overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-[var(--card-fade-color)] shadow-md md:mx-16
relative flex size-full min-h-[600px] flex-col px-5 pb-16 pt-5 lg:max-h-[500px] lg:min-h-[500px] lg:flex-row md:min-h-[800px] md:px-14 md:pt-16

div.p: “Everything I know about programming I learned thanks to GameMaker. It was my very first coding experience and I'm glad I stuck with it. The GameMaker community is also vast and there's tons of content in forums and tutorials, which made the learning process a lot less scary.”

div.class: m-6 size-full overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-[var(--card-fade-color)] shadow-md md:mx-16
relative flex size-full min-h-[600px] flex-col px-5 pb-16 pt-5 lg:max-h-[500px] lg:min-h-[500px] lg:flex-row md:min-h-[800px] md:px-14 md:pt-16

div.p: “Honestly, without GameMaker, I probably wouldn't even have gotten to the hobby stage of game development. It gave me an approachable way to get into game dev and realise my ideas, that I otherwise couldn't have.”

div.class: m-6 size-full overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-[var(--card-fade-color)] shadow-md md:mx-16

div.p: “GML is a lot easier to learn than other programming languages.”

div.p: GameMaker is a complete development tool for making 2D games, used by indie developers, professional studios, and educators worldwide. Create games for Windows, Mac, Linux, Android, iOS, HTML5, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, and Nintendo Switch.
